item.title: flippant remarks about F#

item.title: the most important thing I have learned as a developer in the last ten years
item.description: I will truly be very, very blessed to have 10 more years of life on this Earth as a productive software developer. The most important thing I have learned as a developer in the last ten years is not some engineering technique. It is more of a communicatio…
